name: HackersOut
overview:
Security Guardian is a website security certification which certifies the security of any web site or online service though daily performed penetration and intrusion tests. Security Guardian web security certification has been designed by information security experts for organizations with critical web applications to manage their web application security and show the visitors that they are navigating on a “secure” site. A positive test result meaning that there are no critical vulnerabilities detected is presented by the Security Security GuardianSeal which fosters confidence among your visitors and gives you the cutting edge. In this way you can benefit from:

* Improved security perception of the website visitors and potential customers
* Increased sales as more visitors will trust in your shop and buy
* Integrated protection against potential attacks as the Security Security Guardian Seal shows hackers that the site has been tested and has no critical vulnerabilities
* Thanks to the comprehensive security testing and constant surveillance of Security Guardian vulnerabilities can be detected and solved quickly. The security of your website can be easily improved and secured against new vulnerabilities.
